Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations

Class MyShelfieDarkShadow

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations.MyShelfieShadow
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations.MyShelfieDarkShadow
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieDecoration
public class MyShelfieDarkShadow extends MyShelfieShadow

Direct implementation of the MyShelfieShadow that creates a dark drop shadow for custom components

Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emamuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
